name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Global Sounds and Diversity**

The Footprints Festival 2026 unites an eclectic lineup of 11 artists from 10 different countries, showcasing a remarkable blend of cultures and genres. With a strong emphasis on musical diversity, the festival spans a wide spectrum of styles, from the hypnotic beats of Malian desert blues and Anatolian rock to the experimental edges of minimalist electropop and the vibrant rhythms of Afrobeat. This yearâ€™s lineup features a notable presence of Electronic (3 acts), Psychedelic (2 acts), Indie Pop (2 acts), and Jazz (2 acts), alongside unique offerings like Traditional Iranian, Armenian Folk, and MPB (Brazilian Popular Music).  

Celebrating representation and inclusivity, the festival highlights the contributions of artists from diverse backgrounds, with 7 out of the 11 acts featuring people of color. The lineup also strikes a balance in gender representation, with female-led, male-led, and mixed-gender acts sharing the stage. Notable countries represented include Germany (with 4 acts), alongside performers from Nigeria, Iran, Turkey, and Brazil, reflecting a truly global tapestry of talent.  

With an impressive average rating of 7.73, the festival promises quality performances that resonate with audiences. Most acts are rated between 8-9, with one standout performer scoring a stellar 9-10. Every artist featured is accessible on Spotify, ensuring festivalgoers can connect with their music before the event. Footprints Festival 2026 is set to be a vibrant celebration of musical innovation, cultural exchange, and shared humanity.
